CLASS.name: LOW MOLECULAR WEIGHT HEPARINS AND RELATED DRUGS (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENT)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage (inhibition of the platelet function and irritation of the gastroduodenal mucosa by the acetylsalicylic acid)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage

CLASS.name: LOW MOLECULAR WEIGHT HEPARINS AND RELATED DRUGS (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENT)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage (irritation of the gastroduodenal mucosa by the NSAIs)

CLASS.name: LOW MOLECULAR WEIGHT HEPARINS AND RELATED DRUGS (CURATIVE DOSES AND/OR OLDER PATIENT)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage (inhibition of the platelet function by the dextran 40)

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the risk of hemorrhage
